name: Rose Pistachio Chocolate
description: A delicate balance of floral and nutty notes, Cokha Rose Pistachio Chocolate is an elegant fusion of rose petals and roasted pistachios with velvety cocoa. Perfectly fragrant, beautifully textured — a truly royal chocolate experience.

name: Orange Zest Dark Chocolate
description: Refresh your senses with Cokha Orange Zest Dark Chocolate. The bold intensity of dark cocoa is perfectly lifted with tangy notes of real orange zest, creating a zesty, vibrant, and unforgettable chocolate experience.

name: Velvet Hazelnut Dark Chocolate
description: Dive into smooth luxury with Cokha Velvet Hazelnut Dark Chocolate. Each bite offers the creamy richness of roasted hazelnuts paired with premium dark cocoa. A timeless classic, crafted for nut lovers and true chocolate connoisseurs.

name: Velvet Vine Dark Chocolate
description: Indulge in the richness of Cokha Velvet Vine Dark Chocolate, a premium blend of fine cocoa and plump black raisins. Crafted to perfection, this antioxidant-packed bar balances smooth bitterness with natural fruity sweetness. A perfect treat for those who love depth in every bite.

name: Velvet Walnut Dark Chocolate
description: Crunch meets luxury with Cokha Velvet Walnut Dark Chocolate. Made with handpicked walnuts and intense dark cocoa, this bar is a delightful mix of creamy texture and nutty goodness. A wholesome indulgence that feels as nourishing as it tastes.

name: Mint Fusion Dark Chocolate
description: Cool, crisp, and indulgent — Cokha Mint Fusion Dark Chocolate combines the freshness of natural mint with the depth of rich cocoa. A perfect after-meal treat or a refreshing pick-me-up for mint lovers.

name: Khas-Badam Dark Chocolate
description: Experience tradition wrapped in indulgence with Cokha Khas-Badam Dark Chocolate. Infused with almonds and poppy seeds, this bar is inspired by timeless flavors that comfort the soul. A blend of culture and cocoa, created for those who enjoy richness with heritage.

name: Cocoa & Crunch Chocolate
description: For those who love texture, Cokha Cocoa & Crunch Chocolate delivers the perfect bite. Enriched with mamra almonds and crispy ragi crunch, this wholesome bar combines nutrition with indulgence, making it both guilt-free and irresistible.
